main.name: Joshua Grossman
main.description: I am a Fullstack Software Engineer with a background in corporate sustainability and sustainable finance. I try to create well designed and intuitive products to help make people's lives better and easier.
main.bio: Fullstack Software Engineer with a background in corporate sustainability and sustainable finance. Creating well designed and intuitive products to help make people's lives better and easier. I enjoy coding in React and React Native with a passion for UI/UX engineering and design.
